description:
Improving intra- and inter-observer repeatability and accuracy of keel bone assessment by training with radiographs.

An introduction to repeatability estimation with rptR.

Martin A. Stoffel, Shinichi Nakagawa & Holger Schielzeth.

The functions build heavily on functions for fitting mixed models, in particular on lmer from the lme4 package (Bates et al. 2015).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'keel bone', 'keel', 'inter-observer repeatabilities', 'palpation'
name: rptR
